original_title: Authorities instructed to ensure essential public services during Avurudu
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe on Thursday (04) gave instructions to ensure that essential public services are smoothly carried on during the upcoming Sinhala and Tamil New Year and minimize the inconvenience caused to the general public.
The Head of State gave these directives to the instructions to the respective state officials and ministerial authorities, according to the President’s Media Division (PMD).
